directions: Whisk mayonnaise, chopped dill, Dijon mustard, and lemon juice in medium bowl. Add shrimp, cucumber, and cornichons and toss to coat. Season generously with salt and pepper.
Nestle 2 lettuce leaves on each of 4 plates. Mound shrimp salad in leaves, dividing equally, and serve.
ingredients: 1 cup thinly sliced halved English hothouse cucumber
title: Scandinavian Shrimp Salad with Dill and Cornichons
